original_title: Andrea Perron: House Of Darkness House Of Light
overview: Growing up in the famed farmhouse investigated in the blockbuster hit The Conjuring, Andrea Perron's past has inspired her to write a tell-all book, House of Darkness House Of Light.  Now, with footage and reenactments to support her stories, Perron delves into the haunting tales of her upbringing.
title: Andrea Perron: House Of Darkness House Of Light
